flawed_nl_solution:
Barney uses 2 clean towels every day, so he uses 2 * 7 = <<2*7=14>>14 towels a week.
He missed one week of laundry, so he would need 2 * 14 = <<2*14=82>>82 towels for 2 weeks.
He owns 18 towels, so he has 82 - 18 = <<82-18=64>>64 less than he needs.
Thus, Barney will not have clean towels on 64 / 2 = <<64/2=32>>32 days.
#### 32

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 82. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
